column4: Hi... how can I improve Ubuntus boot time? On the same hardware it takes Ubuntu 71 seconds (48 to GDM, 23 to desktop) when Windows XP takes just 47 (27 to login prompt, 20 to usable desktop)... ideas?
Googled it quite a bit, no reliable advice it seems... lots of ideas, little success
So its either stick with XP or try another distro?
the next version will improve boot times. with hardy there's nothing you can do except disable the services you don't need.
